Header.title: Tecnologies
Header.paragraph: Revolutionizing Food Service with Next-Gen Digital Kiosks & Interactive Standees

About.paragraph: Welcome to Newtonsky5 Technology Private Limited — an advanced technology company shaping the future through innovation and excellence. We are a dedicated team of like-minded individuals driven by a shared vision of success. At Newtonsky5, we believe that our cutting-edge solutions have the potential to make a significant impact in the industry. We invite you to explore our website and discover how we're pushing the boundaries of what's possible. Because at Newtonsky5, we know that a company’s strength lies in the passion and talent of its people.

Services.name: Mobile Application Development
Services.text: We create high-performance, scalable, and user-friendly mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms, tailored to meet your business goals.

Services.name: Web Application Development
Services.text: Our team delivers secure, responsive, and feature-rich web applications that provide seamless user experiences across all devices and browsers.

Services.name: IoT Device Integration
Services.text: From smart sensors to custom IoT hardware, we develop solutions that connect devices and bring your data to life for smarter decision-making.

Services.name: SCO Application Development
Services.text: We specialize in developing custom SCO (Self-Checkout) applications that streamline retail operations and enhance customer satisfaction.

Services.name: UI/UX Design
Services.text: Our design experts craft intuitive and engaging user interfaces that improve usability, accessibility, and the overall user experience.

Services.name: Cloud Solutions
Services.text: We offer scalable cloud infrastructure and deployment services to ensure high availability, performance, and security for your applications.

Products.title: Touchscreen kiosk
Products.description: Interactive kiosks designed for public access to digital content and services.

subItems.title: Information kiosk
subItems.description: Provides general information to users in public areas like malls, hospitals, and offices.

subItems.title: Library kiosk
subItems.description: Facilitates self-check-in/out, catalog browsing, and account management in libraries.

subItems.title: Feedback kiosk
subItems.description: Enables users to give instant feedback through touch inputs at service points.

subItems.title: Way finding kiosk
subItems.description: Helps visitors navigate large spaces like campuses, airports, and malls with interactive maps.

Products.title: Digital standee
Products.description: Freestanding digital displays used for advertisements, announcements, or promotional content.

subItems.title: Vertical digital standee
subItems.description: Tall portrait-oriented displays ideal for lobbies and entrances.

subItems.title: Digital signage
subItems.description: Dynamic digital screens for broadcasting multimedia content across locations.

subItems.title: Double side digital standee
subItems.description: Displays content on both sides to maximize visibility in high-traffic areas.

subItems.title: A frames standee
subItems.description: Foldable A-shaped digital signage for flexible and mobile promotions.

Products.title: Interactive/Information Touch screen kiosk
Products.description: Dual-purpose kiosk offering both interactive and informational functionality.

Products.title: Multi touch screen Kiosk
Products.description: Supports multi-user interaction with advanced multi-touch capabilities.

Products.title: Self ordering Kiosk
Products.description: Enables customers to place orders independently in restaurants, cafes, or retail stores.

Products.title: Interactive Touch Table
Products.description: Horizontal touchscreen table for collaborative tasks, gaming, or presentations.

Products.title: Multi touch screen Table
Products.description: Advanced table with multi-user touch support for education, entertainment, or meetings.

Products.title: Mobile charging Kiosk
Products.description: Secure stations for public mobile phone charging with optional locker systems.
